thread.title: Jazz muso accused of stealing the ANC’s cultural heritage
thread.title_full: Jazz muso accused of stealing the ANC’s cultural heritage | News24

author: news24.com
title: Jazz muso accused of stealing the ANC’s cultural heritage
text:
Four founding members of internationally acclaimed group the Amandla Cultural Ensemble are fuming and claiming that legendary jazz musician Jonas Gwangwa is using the group’s name for his own benefit.
Speaking from his home in Pretoria West, Jabulani Magubane yesterday accused Gwangwa of stealing from the ANC.
“Amandla is ANC property,” said Magubane.
This was after Gwangwa placed an advert in newspapers looking for singers, actors and dancers to revive the ensemble.
